name: Tiny tanks (itch)
description:
Small game made for remake jam in 72 hours. Written in lua, using love2d. 

Original game can be found here: https://gitlab.com/egordoriche... (don't beat me for the code quality!). It is written in c++, using SDL2.

Game supports joysticks (gamepads).

Note: tanks can go though walls some times, that's a collision bug.
